column1: The Gazetteer for Scotland History Time-Line
The Scottish History Time-Line provides an alternative route to access
for Scotland. The time-line incorporates thousands of
Scottish historical events including the births and deaths of famous Scots
archaeological sites and historic buildings in Scotland
the dates of battles and other cultural events. Each event is colour coded
The time-line is fully linked into the vast store of information which forms
Choose a time-period from the list below:
presented in chronological order.  The time-lines only give direct access to
a limited number of Gazetteer for Scotland entries
some can ever have dates associated with them.
